title: Hello, crowd!
body:
Yep, I was asked to remove myself from markable.in site. I can only thank them for being so resistant to DMCA request all that time.

Soon I will post all my repacks here.

It’s the first time I work with wordpress, so be patient. It seems pretty easy, yes, but I need time to set the things up.

And yes, fuck DMCA 🙂

You can also contact me here and give me all your cash here.
